trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_1](../Token/win8_client_1_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_1](../Token/win8_server_1_md.md)] include [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and all of its prerequisites.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_1](../Token/win8_client_1_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_server_1](../Token/win8_server_1_md.md)] incluem [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e todos seus pré-requisitos.

trans-unit.source: The system also includes the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine for backward compatibility with host programs that cannot use [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O sistema também inclui o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] para fins de compatibilidade com programas de host que não podem usar [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on earlier systems and install and enable the required features.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico explica como instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] em sistemas anteriores, e instalar e habilitar os recursos necessários.

trans-unit.source: This topic includes the following sections:
trans-unit.target: Este tópico inclui as seções a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 8 e no Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 7 e no Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows Server 2008

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Server Core

trans-unit.source: Deploying Windows PowerShell Web Access
trans-unit.target: Implantar o Windows PowerShell Web Access

trans-unit.source: Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 8 e no Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] arrives installed, configured, and ready to use.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] já vem instalado, configurado e pronto para usar.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] is installed and enabled.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] está instalado e habilitado.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)], see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows 8](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d7be1668-8617-4890-ad90-dd9765fbd2c3) and [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2012](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4fc0110a-cc0c-42a4-bbb5-3cc89a0fc968).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 8](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d7be1668-8617-4890-ad90-dd9765fbd2c3) e [Iniciar o Windows PowerShell no Windows Server 2012](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4fc0110a-cc0c-42a4-bbb5-3cc89a0fc968).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows 7 e no Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on computers running [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1 and [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Estas instruções explicam como instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] em computadores que executam o [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)] com o Service Pack 1 e o [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] com o Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: There are separate installation instructions below for computers running with the Server Core installation option of [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Há instruções de instalação separadas abaixo para computadores com a opção de instalação Server Core do [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Preparando para instalar

trans-unit.source: Before installing [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Antes de instalar o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], desinstale as versões anteriores do Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).
trans-unit.target: Instale a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).

trans-unit.source: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).
trans-unit.target: Ou então, instale o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: Install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Instale o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows](../Topic/Starting-Windows-PowerShell-on-Earlier-Versions-of-Windows.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar o Windows PowerShell em versões anteriores do Windows](../Topic/Starting-Windows-PowerShell-on-Earlier-Versions-of-Windows.md).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Server Core

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on computers running the Server Core installation option of [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Estas instruções explicam como instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] em computadores que executam a opção de instalação Server Core do [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] com o Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: The first steps in the procedure use Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) commands to install Microsoft [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](../Token/dnprdnlong_md.md)] for Server Core and [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: As primeiras etapas no procedimento usam comandos DISM (Gerenciamento e Manutenção de Imagens de Implantação) para instalar o Microsoft [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](../Token/dnprdnlong_md.md)] Server Core e [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: These programs are prerequisites for [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], which is installed in a subsequent step.
trans-unit.target: Esses programas são pré-requisitos para [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], que é instalado em uma etapa posterior.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Preparando para instalar

trans-unit.source: Before installing [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Antes de instalar o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], desinstale as versões anteriores do Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Start Cmd.exe
trans-unit.target: Iniciar Cmd.exe

trans-unit.source: Run the following DISM commands.
trans-unit.target: Execute um dos seguintes comandos DISM.

trans-unit.source: These commands install [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](../Token/dnprdnlong_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Estes comandos instalam o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](../Token/dnprdnlong_md.md)] e o [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](../Token/netfx40_short_md.md)] full installation for Server Core from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450).
trans-unit.target: Instale a instalação completa do Microsoft [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](../Token/netfx40_short_md.md)] para Server Core do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450).

trans-unit.source: Install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Instale o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell no Windows Server 2008

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on computers running [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] with Service Pack 2.
trans-unit.target: Estas instruções explicam como instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] em computadores que executam o [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] com o Service Pack 2.

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] systems, Windows Management Framework ([!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], KB 968930) is a prerequisite for [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Em sistemas [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], o Windows Management Framework ([!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], KB 968930) é um pré-requisito para o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The "Extended Protection for Authentication" feature protects the computer from authentication forwarding attacks and allows you to use the **UseSSL** parameter when creating remote sessions.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de "Proteção Estendida para Autenticação" protege o computador contra ataques de encaminhamento de autenticação e permite que você use parâmetro **UseSSL** ao criar sessões remotas.

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine, use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: Use o procedimento a seguir para instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Preparando para instalar

trans-unit.source: Before installing [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Antes de instalar o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], desinstale as versões anteriores do Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 with Service Pack 1 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 com Service Pack 1 no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework ([!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], KB 968930) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035).
trans-unit.target: Instale o Windows Management Framework ([!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], KB 968930) no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035).

trans-unit.source: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).
trans-unit.target: Instale a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).

trans-unit.source: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).
trans-unit.target: Ou então, instale o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) no Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: Install "Extended Protection for Authentication" (KB 968389) from [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398).
trans-unit.target: Instale a "Proteção Estendida para Autenticação" (KB 968389) de [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398).

trans-unit.source: Install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Instale o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] do Centro de Download da Microsoft em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Consulte Também

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell [ps]
trans-unit.target: Iniciando o Windows PowerShell [ps]
